description: Retrieves a list of all the servers fetched from customer vCenter using Strategy Recommendation Collector.

nested_items.name: analyzableServers
nested_items.description: The list of analyzable servers with summary information about each server.

nested_items.name: hostname
nested_items.description: The host name of the analyzable server.

nested_items.name: ipAddress
nested_items.description: The ip address of the analyzable server.

nested_items.name: source
nested_items.description: The data source of the analyzable server.

nested_items.name: vmId
nested_items.description: The virtual machine id of the analyzable server.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The token you use to retrieve the next set of results, or null if there are no more results.
